files.description: End-to-end single-cycle pipeline that generates outputs/results.json, outputs/figure.png, outputs/run.log, outputs/test.log, and outputs/STATUS.md deterministically.
Plotting helpers to render a canonical figure.png from the pipeline results with consistent styling and deterministic output.
Utility functions for structured logging, JSON read/write, directory management, and reproducible timestamp/run metadata capture.
Smoke test that runs the pipeline and asserts that all required output artifacts are created and minimally valid.
CLI entrypoint to run the pipeline end-to-end and write all evidence pack artifacts into the outputs directory.
CI script that installs dependencies, runs formatting checks (if available), executes tests, runs the evidence pack, and exits nonzero on failure.
GitHub Actions workflow implementing CI/CD to run tests and generate the evidence pack artifacts on each push and pull request.
Pinned runtime and test dependencies required to run the pipeline and generate figure outputs in CI.
Project documentation explaining how to run the pipeline, where artifacts are written, and how CI/CD validates the evidence pack.

missionDescription: Create a single-cycle "evidence pack": run the pipeline end-to-end, commit /outputs/results.json, /outputs/figure.png, /outputs/run.log, /outputs/test.log, and add a short /outputs/STATUS.md summarizing what ran, where outputs are, and what passed.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): The audit finding (code exists but zero documents/analysis outputs/execution evidence) identifies the primary blocker to momentum and Definition-of-Done. Addressing it immediately increases credibilit...
